instruction: Compose a rap about washing your hands.
output:
Verse 1:
Before you bite on something sweet
Make sure to keep your hands clean
In the kitchen, bathroom, work and school
Keeping your hands clean is the rule

Verse 2:
With the lather and soap, keeping it clean
Making sure your hands become pristine
It only takes 20 seconds to do
Why don’t you sing a song and make it through

Chorus:
Washing the hands, killing the germs
Soap and lather, do this for the terms
No more harm and keep it chill
Cleanliness is the key to get the deal

Verse 3:
Alcohol-based sanitizers sound great
Shiny and clean hands, ain’t that great
Safe from illness and other unwelcome things
So come on and wash your hands for the win

Chorus:
Washing the hands, killing the germs
Soap and lather, do this for the terms
No more harm and keep it chill
Cleanliness is the key to get the deal

Outro:
Going on and on, this is the song
Frankly, I think it won’t be so wrong
Keep your hands clean you’re under the sun
You’ll win the fight with this good old gun!
